activities: GXS receives and uses personal information in the course of GXS’ business activities which includes, without limitation: (1) personal information of current, former or prospective employees and contractors of GXS in connection with the administration of personnel relationships, providing services and benefits in connection with personnel relationships, maintaining contact with former personnel, and reviewing information concerning job applicants; (2) personal information of employees and other personnel of customers and prospective customers of GXS and other affiliated companies in the Open Text group in connection with the promotion and sale of GXS and Open Text services and products and the provision and support of GXS and Open Text services and products to current and prospective customers including but not limited to provide services, respond to inquiries, send requested information, provide training and customer support services, (3) personal information of employees of third parties (such as vendors and contractors) or third party individuals in connection with managing and administering business activities with such third parties; and (4) personal information of customers of GXS and Open Text group customers and prospective customers processed using GXS and Open Text group services in connection with the promotion and provision of services and support of such customers and prospective customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, online, manually processed and human resources data
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and/or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
